projects.name: Covid19-In API
projects.desc: A simple api to track covid19 cases in India. Updated every 30 mins. Built using Python (Flask , BeautifulSoup4). Returns a JSON response.

projects.name: Covid19- WebApp
projects.desc: Visualisation of covid19 cases in India using Bootstrap4 , ChartJS

projects.name: Cricscores
projects.desc: A web app to display live cricket scores. Built using python (Flask) .

projects.name: mGradients
projects.desc: A web application to generate random material gradients. Built using Python,Materialize CSS.

projects.name: jokepy
projects.desc: Python wrapper for sv443 joke api
